item.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Service degradation
item.description:
Nov 16, 07:46 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 15/11/2023 06:30 UTC
End time : 15/11/2023 16:34 UTC
Root cause : Fiber continuity issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 15, 16:27 UTC
Update - Our provider's technicians are still on site and are continuing the intervention, which is taking longer than expected.

Nov 15, 14:08 UTC
Update - Update : Our provider has located the fault.
Technicians are deployed to repair and re-establish access

Nov 15, 12:06 UTC
Update - Our provider carries out the intervention on site in order to locate the fault and restore services.

Nov 15, 11:08 UTC
Update - We have a generic incident which impacts a large number of services throughout France.
This is linked to the loss of a backbone link from our provider in Île-de-France which creates saturation on our network and causes a degradation of your services.
The provider's teams are on site to locate the fault.

Nov 15, 09:21 UTC
Update - Update : The incident is currently being dealt with by the provider's teams. An update will be published when significant progress has been made.

Nov 15, 09:16 UTC
Identified - Start time : 15/11/2023 06:30UTC
Service impact : A degradation was detected on the provider equipment, leading to a deterioration of the connection to the services. Some latency, disruption with the connection, and service degradation will be observed
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][Manager] - Web Hosting/CDN/Databases statistics
item.description:
Nov 9, 11:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 7, 15:54 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/11/2023 11:00 UTC
End time : 30/12/2024 14:07 UTC
Service impact :
1 - CDN statistics won't be available in the manager. You can access your data on the OVHcloud Web Statistics page to help you track and manage your website traffic.

2 - Web Hosting and Databses statistics won't be available in the manager during the periods indicated below:
The first cuts will take place on :
• 6 Nov 2023: 12h - 13h CET - Done
• 9 Nov 2023: 12h - 13h CET - Rescheduled
• 13 Nov 2023: 12h - 13h CET - Done
• 23 Nov 2023: 12h - 15h CET
• 30 Nov 2023: 14h - 15h CET
• 4 Dec 2023: 14h - 15h CET
• 5 Dec 2023: 12h - 17h CET
• 12 Dec 2023: 10h - 17h CET
• 14 Dec 2023: 14h - 16h CET
• 15 Dec 2023: 10h - 17h CET
• 18 Dec 2023: 12h - 16h CET
• 19 Dec 2023: 10h - 17h CET

Permanent shutdown on 20/12/2023 for a few months.

Not impacted metrics for Databases are: "Shared", "Disk space consumption" and "Logs".
Not impacted metric for Web Hosting is: "Disk space consumed".

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a migration to our Manager Database which might have an impact on Web Hosting, CDN, Databases metrics in the manager.
